articles.title: Noto Peninsula Earthquake Recovery Support: KANJIN OOSUMO ～charity sumo event～
articles.content: Japanese sitemap home>Kyokai Information>　Information  The Japan Sumo Association will hold a Kanjin Oosumo to support recovery from the Noto Peninsula Earthquake.All admission fees will be donated to support the reconstruction of the Noto Peninsula. TICKETS ON SALE:  From 10:00 on Sunday, March 17, 2024 for more ticket information How to Buy Tournament Schedule Matches Information Banzuke Information Topics Information Tour Schedule A day at Jungyo History Calendar Find Rikishi Sumo Stable Guide Information Kyokai Members List  Copyright © Nihon Sumo Kyokai all rights reserved.
